price: 37. Was hij geen gemengd druppel die uit werd gegoten?
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَكُ نُطۡفَةٗ مِّن مَّنِيّٖ يُمۡنَىٰ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: alam yaku nuṭ'fatan min maniyyin yum'nā
